mapper.select: select * from user_info where id not in ('admin1', 'admin2', 'admin3', 'admin4', 'admin5')
select * from music
select * from user_info where id = #{id}
select * from genre
select count(*) from user_info where id not in ('admin1', 'admin2', 'admin3', 'admin4', 'admin5')
select * from ( select rownum r_num, a.* from (select * from user_info where id = #{id} and id not in ('admin1', 'admin2', 'admin3', 'admin4', 'admin5')) a )
SELECT m.music_code,m.artist,m.music_title,m.path,m.music_hit,m.music_regdate,m.genre_code,m.playtime FROM musiclist L JOIN music M ON (L.music_code=M.music_code) WHERE playlist_code=#{playlist_code}
select distinct ${field} from ( select rownum r_num, a.* from ( (select * from music where lower(${field}) LIKE '%' || lower(#{search_text}) || '%' order by music_hit desc) a) ) where r_num < 7

select distinct ${field} from ( select rownum r_num, a.* from ( (select * from music where lower(${field}) LIKE '%' || lower(#{search_text}) || '%' and genre_code = #{genre} order by music_hit desc) a) ) where r_num < 7
select count(*) from music
select count(*) from (select * from music where lower(${field}) = lower(#{search_text}))
select count(*) from (select * from music where genre_code = #{genre})
select count(*) from ( select * from music where genre_code = #{genre} and lower(${field}) = lower(#{search_text}))
insert into musiclist values(musiclist_seq.nextval,#{music_code},#{playlist_code})
select p.playlist_code,p.playlist_title,u.id from playlist p, user_info u where p.user_info_code = u.user_info_code and p.user_info_code=#{user_info_code} order by p.playlist_code asc
select count(p.playlist_code) from playlist p,user_info u where p.user_info_code=u.user_info_code and p.user_info_code=#{user_info_code}

select ml.musiclist_code,m.music_code,m.artist,m.music_title from musiclist ml,playlist p, music m, user_info u where ml.playlist_code = p.playlist_code and ml.music_code = m.music_code and u.user_info_code=p.user_info_code and ml.playlist_code=#{playlist_code} and u.user_info_code=#{user_info_code} order by ml.musiclist_code asc
select * from theme

select * from( select rownum r_num, a.* from( select p.playlist_code,p.playlist_title,u.id from playlist p, user_info u where p.user_info_code = u.user_info_code and p.user_info_code=#{user_info_code} order by p.playlist_code asc) a ) where r_num between #{begin} and #{end}
select count(f.favorite_code) from favorite f,playlist p, user_info u where f.playlist_code = p.playlist_code and f.user_info_code=u.user_info_code and u.user_info_code=#{user_info_code}
mapper.update: update playlist set hit = hit-1 where playlist_code=#{playlist_code}
mapper.select: select * from theme
select rownum r_num, a.* from (select * from music where music_code in (select music_code from musiclist where playlist_code = #{playlist_code})) a

select user_info.id, reply_code, content, reply.regdate from reply, user_info where reply.playlist_code = #{playlist_code} and reply.user_info_code = user_info.user_info_code order by reply.regdate desc
